metadata.title: CVE-2017-8086 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Memory leak in the v9fs_list_xattr function in hw/9pfs/9p-xattr.c in QEMU (aka Quick Emulator) allows local guest OS privileged users to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) via vectors involving the orig_value variable.

notes.note: mdeslaur> possibly introduced by fix for CVE-2016-9602

criterions.comment: qemu package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2.8+dfsg-3ubuntu3').
